name: GRIIM
description:
This game isn't finished, sorry about that (I recommend playing the sequel instead https://midorimonki.itch.io/grim).  I've been busy so I only was able to put in half the amount of time into this project as I would have wanted to, do not have high hopes for this one lol.

Anyway, follow Sunny through the valley of Grim as she attempts to restore its original beauty. There’s 2 bosses to beat and that’s about it.

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD to move, Mouse to aim. Left mouse click to dash attack, Right mouse click to parry/block attacks.

Press Space to talk to people.

The bar on the left represents your health, hitting enemies will cause you to drain their blood, increasing your health.

If you have a problem with sizing, zoom out with crtl - or command - ...... I think.
